-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
In this update of Disney&#039;s masterpiece film mixture of animation and music, new 
interpretations of great works of music are presented. It begins with an 
abstract battle of light and darkness set to the music of Beethoveen&#039;s Fifth 
Symphony. Then we see the adventures of a Humpback Whale calf and his pod set to 
"The Pines of Rome." Next is the humourous story of several lives in 1930&#039;s New 
York City, scored with "Rhapsody in Blue." Following is a musical telling of the 
fairy tale, "The Steadfast Tin Soldier" set to Dmitri Shostakovich&#039;s Piano 
Concerto No. 2. Then a goofy Flamingo causes havoc in his flock with his yo-yo 
to the tune of the finale of "Carnival of the Animals." This is followed by the 
classic sequence from the original film, "The Sorcerer&#039;s Apprentice" starring 
Mickey Mouse and followed by "Pomp and Circumstance" starring Donald Duck as a 
harried assistant to Noah on his Ark. Finally, we see the awesome tale of the 
life, death and renewal of a forest in a sequence featuring the composition, 
"The Firebird."
